languages.text: "Мы получаем рапорты... это приказ Адептус Администратум. Нам передано несколько официальных формуляров, но суть сводится к тому, что орбита Даргонуса в данный момент признана небезопасной для хранения десятины ввиду некой угрозы, возникшей на мире в ваше отсутствие".

"We are getting reports... of it being an order of the Adeptus Administratum. We have received several official forms to the effect that Dargonus's orbit is currently deemed unsafe for tithe storage due to an unspecified threat that has sprung up on the world in your absence."
languages.original_text: "Мы получаем рапорты... это приказ Адептус Администратум. Нам передано несколько официальных формуляров, но суть сводится к тому, что орбита Даргонуса в данный момент признана небезопасной для хранения десятины ввиду некой угрозы, возникшей на мире в ваше отсутствие".

traits.locale_text: "We are getting reports... of it being an order of the Adeptus Administratum. We have received several official forms to the effect that Dargonus's orbit is currently deemed unsafe for tithe storage due to an unspecified threat that has sprung up on the world in your absence."

"We are getting reports... of it being an order of the Adeptus Administratum. We have received several official forms to the effect that Dargonus's orbit is currently deemed unsafe for tithe storage due to some threat that sprung up on the world in your absence."

"We are getting reports... of it being an order of the Adeptus Administratum. We have received several official forms to the effect that Dargonus's orbit is currently deemed unsafe for tithe storage due to an unspecified threat that has sprung up on the world in your absence."

"We are getting reports... of it being an order of the Adeptus Administratum. We have received several official forms to the effect that Dargonus's orbit is currently deemed unsafe for tithe storage due to an unspecified threat that has sprung up on the world in your absence."

"We are getting reports... of it being an order of the Adeptus Administratum. We have received several official forms to the effect that Dargonus's orbit is currently deemed unsafe for tithe storage due to an unspecified threat that has sprung up on the world in your absence."

"We are getting reports... of it being an order of the Adeptus Administratum. We have received several official forms to the effect that Dargonus's orbit is currently deemed unsafe for tithe storage due to an unspecified threat that has sprung up on the world in your absence."

languages.text: "Wir erhalten Berichte ... dass es sich um einen Befehl des Adeptus Administratum handelt. Mehreren offiziellen Meldungen zufolge gilt der Orbit von Dargonus derzeit als unsicher zur Lagerung des Zehnts – wegen einer unspezifizierten Bedrohung, die sich während Eurer Abwesenheit auf der Welt manifestiert hat."
languages.original_text: "We are getting reports... of it being an order of the Adeptus Administratum. We have received several official forms to the effect that Dargonus's orbit is currently deemed unsafe for tithe storage due to an unspecified threat that has sprung up on the world in your absence."

traits.locale_text: "Wir erhalten Berichte ... dass es sich um einen Befehl des Adeptus Administratum handelt. Mehreren offiziellen Meldungen zufolge gilt der Orbit von Dargonus derzeit als unsicher zur Lagerung des Zehnts – wegen einer unspezifizierten Bedrohung, die sich während Eurer Abwesenheit auf der Welt manifestiert hat."

languages.text: « Nous recevons plusieurs rapports... dont un ordre de l'Adeptus Administratum. Plusieurs formulaires officiels nous signalent que l'orbite de Dargonus est désormais considérée comme trop dangereuse pour l'entreposage de la dîme, en raison d'une menace non identifiée ayant fait son apparition en votre absence. »
languages.original_text: "We are getting reports... of it being an order of the Adeptus Administratum. We have received several official forms to the effect that Dargonus's orbit is currently deemed unsafe for tithe storage due to an unspecified threat that has sprung up on the world in your absence."

traits.locale_text: « Nous recevons plusieurs rapports... dont un ordre de l'Adeptus Administratum. Plusieurs formulaires officiels nous signalent que l'orbite de Dargonus est désormais considérée comme trop dangereuse pour l'entreposage de la dîme, en raison d'une menace non identifiée ayant fait son apparition en votre absence. »

languages.text: “我们收到了几份报告……是帝国内政部发过来的。报告内容是几份官方表格，大意是说，您不在达戈努斯的这段时间，您的首都出现了某种未知威胁。由于上述原因，达戈努斯目前并不适合继续储存帝国什一税。”
languages.original_text: "We are getting reports... of it being an order of the Adeptus Administratum. We have received several official forms to the effect that Dargonus's orbit is currently deemed unsafe for tithe storage due to an unspecified threat that has sprung up on the world in your absence."

traits.locale_text: “我们收到了几份报告……是帝国内政部发过来的。报告内容是几份官方表格，大意是说，您不在达戈努斯的这段时间，您的首都出现了某种未知威胁。由于上述原因，达戈努斯目前并不适合继续储存帝国什一税。”

languages.text: «Recibimos informes... de que ha sido orden del Adeptus Administratum. Tenemos notificaciones oficiales que comunican que la órbita de Dargonus no se considera segura para el almacenamiento del diezmo debido a una amenaza no especificada que ha surgido en el planeta durante su ausencia».
languages.original_text: "We are getting reports... of it being an order of the Adeptus Administratum. We have received several official forms to the effect that Dargonus's orbit is currently deemed unsafe for tithe storage due to an unspecified threat that has sprung up on the world in your absence."

traits.locale_text: «Recibimos informes... de que ha sido orden del Adeptus Administratum. Tenemos notificaciones oficiales que comunican que la órbita de Dargonus no se considera segura para el almacenamiento del diezmo debido a una amenaza no especificada que ha surgido en el planeta durante su ausencia».

languages.text: 「報告が入っています…これは帝国行政局の命令だそうです。複数の公式書類が届いており、ダルゴナスの軌道は現在、この惑星で不特定の脅威があなたの不在中に発生したため、租税の保管には安全ではないと見なされています」
languages.original_text: "We are getting reports... of it being an order of the Adeptus Administratum. We have received several official forms to the effect that Dargonus's orbit is currently deemed unsafe for tithe storage due to an unspecified threat that has sprung up on the world in your absence."

traits.locale_text: 「報告が入っています…これは帝国行政局の命令だそうです。複数の公式書類が届いており、ダルゴナスの軌道は現在、この惑星で不特定の脅威があなたの不在中に発生したため、租税の保管には安全ではないと見なされています」

languages.text: "Elimize bazı raporlar ulaşıyor. Bunun Adeptus Administratum emriyle gerçekleştiği bildiriliyor. Dargonus yörüngesinin, sizin yokluğunuzda ortaya çıkan tanımlanmamış bir tehdit sebebiyle haraç depolamaya uygun olmadığına dair çeşitli resmî belgeler aldık."
languages.original_text: "We are getting reports... of it being an order of the Adeptus Administratum. We have received several official forms to the effect that Dargonus's orbit is currently deemed unsafe for tithe storage due to an unspecified threat that has sprung up on the world in your absence."

traits.locale_text: "Elimize bazı raporlar ulaşıyor. Bunun Adeptus Administratum emriyle gerçekleştiği bildiriliyor. Dargonus yörüngesinin, sizin yokluğunuzda ortaya çıkan tanımlanmamış bir tehdit sebebiyle haraç depolamaya uygun olmadığına dair çeşitli resmî belgeler aldık."
